text: Henry Bell was an American professional football player. A halfback, he played football at Valdosta, Georgia, High School, and did not play college football. Professionally, he played for the Denver Broncos of the American Football League in 1960. ==See also== *List of American Football League players Category:Denver Broncos (AFL) players Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American football halfbacks
title: Henry Bell (American football)
